summary: A website for IPL prediction tips

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that displays IPL (Indian Premier League) match prediction tips with a clear header and navigation
Create a predictions listing page that displays all available match prediction tips in a card-based layout
Add a detailed prediction view page that shows comprehensive information about a specific match prediction including analysis and reasoning

Design a creative and sporty visual theme that reflects cricket and IPL excitement with bold colors, dynamic typography, and cricket-inspired design elements to create an engaging user experience throughout the application
Add a Contact Us section to the homepage displaying contact information such as email address and social media links
Implement a popup modal that appears automatically when a user first opens the website to collect contact details

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for IPL prediction tips
Implement a backend data structure to store IPL match predictions including team names, match date, predicted winner, and confidence level
Implement backend methods to add new prediction tips including update and query functions
Add a contact us section to the website
Implement a pop-up modal that appears when someone opens the site to collect contact details
